verbose_text: Such tissue specific expression was also reported for different PDAT members in flax, where LuPDAT1 / LuPDAT5 were highly expressed during the fast phase of lipid accumulation in the middle seed development stages, while LuPDAT6 mRNA levels substantially increased during the initial stages of embryo development.
evidence: flax              , where LuPDAT1/LuPDAT5 were highly expressed
